data.title: The Continent Makers and Other Tales of the Viagens by L. Sprague de Camp: Good (1971) Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780451048257 - Signed by Author(s) - Soft cover - New American Library - 1971 - Condition: Good - Signed Copy . From the library of science fiction and fantasy writer, editor, publisher and prolific book reviewer D. Douglas Fratz. Signed by author L. Sprague de Camp on title page. In protective plastic bag. Slightly dampstained. (Vintage paperbacks, Science fiction, fantasy) - The Continent Makers and Other Tales of the Viagens
